Package com.turing123.robotframe.interceptor

拦截器相关API,详见Package Description.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    InterceptCallback
    The callback for interception
    IState
    The interface for implementing states in a StateMachine
    MessageInterceptor
    Inherit this interface to implement message interceptor
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    State
    The class for implementing states in a StateMachine
    StateBuilder
    The builder to build Build-in State Machine

    INSTRUCTION:
    Build-in State Machine pre-defined working mode as below:
    NoneMode: the robot no need State Machine, any message/event will be proceeded at any time
    DefaultMode: the robot working on the pre-defined State Machine
    FreezingMode: rarely use.
    StateMachine
    StateMachine.LogRec
    StateMachine logging record.

Package com.turing123.robotframe.interceptor Description

拦截器相关API,详见Package Description.

拦截器用来实现对机器人function调用的拦截，以此来实现机器人的不同状态管理。框架默认的拦截器使用状态机实现，开发者可在框架初始化时 调用StateBuilder的API来build框架的默认拦截器。
同时，框架也支持在初始化时传入开发者自定义的拦截器来实现对事件的拦截。这时开发者需实现接口MessageInterceptor 来实现自定义的拦截器。
当然，开发者也可以自定义自己的状态机拦截器，状态机拦截器的实现需要用户集成类StateMachine
